1. Loan Management and Automation Software: Develop a cloud-based software that automates the loan processing, disbursal, and management process for small to medium-sized businesses. The software can also provide real-time loan performance tracking and credit scoring.
* How it will make money: The software can be offered as a subscription-based model, where customers pay a monthly or annual fee to use the software. Additionally, the company can also earn revenue from interest on loans disbursed through the software.
2. Invoice Factoring: Offer a factoring service that allows small to medium-sized businesses to sell their outstanding invoices to KubitCred at a discounted rate. The company can then collect the payment from the customer directly, providing the business with quick access to cash.
* How it will make money: KubitCred can earn a fee for providing the factoring service, and also charge interest on the amount of the invoices sold.
3. Supplier Financing: Offer a financing service to suppliers that allows them to receive cash for their outstanding invoices more quickly, without having to wait for payment from their customers.
* How it will make money: KubitCred can earn interest on the amount of the financing provided to suppliers, as well as a fee for providing the service.

These product ideas leverage KubitCred's expertise in the financial services sector and target the needs of small to medium-sized businesses. By automating processes, providing access to funding, and offering financial services that improve cash flow, KubitCred can turn a profit in less than 2 years.
